title: Task 1.1.1 — Ontology Source Loader
body:
Implements loading of root OWL/Turtle ontology files.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.1.1.1 Load TTL files
- [ ] 1.1.1.2 Validate file accessibility
- [ ] 1.1.1.3 Detect base ontology

title: Task 1.1.2 — owl:imports Resolution
body:
Implements recursive owl:imports resolution.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.1.2.1 Resolve direct imports
- [ ] 1.1.2.2 Resolve cascading imports
- [ ] 1.1.2.3 Track import provenance

title: Task 1.1.3 — Import Cycle Detection
body:
Prevents infinite ontology import loops.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.1.3.1 Detect cyclic imports
- [ ] 1.1.3.2 Raise structured import errors

title: Task 1.1.99 — Unit Tests: Import Pipeline
body: Unit tests for ontology loading and import resolution.

title: Task 1.2.1 — RDF Triple Normalization
body:
Normalizes raw RDF triples into canonical form.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.2.1.1 Expand CURIEs
- [ ] 1.2.1.2 Normalize literals

title: Task 1.2.2 — Prefix Resolution
body:
Resolves namespace prefixes consistently.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.2.2.1 Extract prefix map
- [ ] 1.2.2.2 Expand prefixed IRIs

title: Task 1.2.3 — Triple Provenance Tracking
body:
Tracks ontology source for each triple.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.2.3.1 Attach ontology origin
- [ ] 1.2.3.2 Preserve merged provenance

title: Task 1.2.99 — Unit Tests: RDF Normalization
body: Unit tests for triple normalization and prefixes.

title: Task 1.3.1 — Class Extraction
body:
Extracts all owl:Class entities.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.3.1.1 Parse owl:Class triples
- [ ] 1.3.1.2 Attach labels and annotations

title: Task 1.3.2 — Object Property Extraction
body:
Extracts owl:ObjectProperty entities.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.3.2.1 Parse object properties
- [ ] 1.3.2.2 Resolve domain and range

title: Task 1.3.3 — Data Property Extraction
body:
Extracts owl:DatatypeProperty entities.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.3.3.1 Parse data properties
- [ ] 1.3.3.2 Attach XSD datatypes

title: Task 1.3.4 — Individual Extraction
body:
Extracts named individuals.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.3.4.1 Detect owl:NamedIndividual
- [ ] 1.3.4.2 Attach property assertions

title: Task 1.3.99 — Unit Tests: OWL Entity Extraction
body: Unit tests for all OWL entity extraction.

title: Task 1.4.1 — subClassOf Graph Builder
body:
Builds full rdfs:subClassOf hierarchy.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.4.1.1 Build directed class graph
- [ ] 1.4.1.2 Compute root classes

title: Task 1.4.2 — Domain & Range Resolution
body:
Resolves property domain and range.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.4.2.1 Resolve domain classes
- [ ] 1.4.2.2 Resolve range classes

title: Task 1.4.3 — Relation Indexing
body:
Indexes inbound and outbound relations.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.4.3.1 Build outgoing edges
- [ ] 1.4.3.2 Build incoming edges

title: Task 1.4.99 — Unit Tests: Relations & Hierarchy
body: Unit tests for class hierarchy and relations.

title: Task 1.5.1 — Canonical Query API (Classes)
body:
Query API for classes.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.5.1.1 List all classes
- [ ] 1.5.1.2 Fetch class by IRI

title: Task 1.5.2 — Canonical Query API (Properties)
body:
Query API for properties.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.5.2.1 List all properties
- [ ] 1.5.2.2 Fetch property by IRI

title: Task 1.5.3 — Canonical Query API (Individuals)
body:
Query API for individuals.

### Subtasks
- [ ] 1.5.3.1 List all individuals
- [ ] 1.5.3.2 Fetch individual by IRI

title: Task 1.5.99 — Unit Tests: Canonical Query API
body: Unit tests for canonical query API.

title: Task 1.99.1 — Phase 1 Integration Validation
body: Full end-to-end validation of ontology ingestion and query API.
